brainly_data.question: _____ and _____ are the only presidents in american history to have been impeached and acquitted. andrew johnson; bill clinton richard nixon; franklin roosevelt andrew jackson; herbert hoover thomas jefferson; martin van buren woodrow wilson; jimmy carter
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: _____ and _____ are the only presidents in american history to have been impeached and acquitted. andrew johnson; bill clinton richard nixon; franklin roosevelt andrew jackson; herbert hoover thomas jefferson; martin van buren woodrow wilson; jimmy carter
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The correct answer are Andrew Johnson and Bill Clinton. Both mens impeachment were passed by the House of Representatives. However, the Senate acquitted both men. Johnson came closer to actual removal as he was only one vote away from being removed from office.
